title: Aadhya Kundan Polki Haaram with Ruby Accents
materials: Natural Rubies. Features exquisite Hyderabadi Kundan craftsmanship. Diamonds display high clarity and are expertly set in traditional Kundan style.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases the timeless beauty of Kundan craftsmanship, blending traditional Telugu design with a modern aesthetic. Features alternating square Polki diamond settings and intricately designed Ruby flower motifs. The central pendant is a larger square Polki, surrounded by smaller Polkis, creating a captivating focal point.
colors: Ruby Red. The combination of the warm gold tone with the vibrant ruby creates a rich and royal color palette
occasions: and significant celebrations like Seemantham or Half-Saree function. Can also be styled for upscale modern events.
description: This Kundan Polki Haaram embodies a heritage of craftsmanship and elegance. The use of untreated Polki diamonds gives it a unique character and brilliance, enhanced by the vibrant Rubies. Its durability ensures it can be treasured for generations as a cherished family heirloom (Sambhandham). The modern design makes it versatile enough to be worn with both traditional and contemporary attire.
